name: クリアα
message: "Ugh, aaah..."
Both Alphas fall to the floor, clutching their heads in pain.
Before long... they stop moving.
Clear's song slows to a stop, and then his knees also buckle.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear!"
I barely manage to catch him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What was that song?"

name: クリア
message: "I used the maximum power of my singing to overload the Alphas' processors."

name: クリア
message: "Originally, I was only programmed to sing the same song as the Alphas, so I had to invert the melodies."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You... inverted it?"

name: クリア
message: "I think it was something Grandpa programmed into me, for emergencies."

name: クリア
message: "The inverted melody should produce waveforms that the Alphas are unable to process."

name: クリア
message: "So I thought, if I sang it at maximum capacity, it might overload their processors."

name: クリア
message: "I wasn't sure if it would work, though..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that's what you were doing... You scared the shit out of me, dummy."

name: クリア
message: "I'm sorry."
Clear smiles sheepishly.
I look around, but Toue is already gone. He must've escaped into that other room.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That asshole..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?!"
Suddenly, the tower starts shaking.
What the hell?
On the walls, screens flicker to life. For a second, I see a face...

name: クリア
message: "...Our original was just terminated."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Your original?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. The symbol of Toue's ambitions... and the source of the power supporting Platinum Jail."

name: クリア
message: "I already destroyed my hard lock. That's why it's not affecting me. But the Alphas have had their power cut off. They won't be getting up again."

name: クリア
message: "And now, this entire tower is going to collapse."
I barely understand what Clear is saying.
But it doesn't matter. I can worry about the details when we're not trapped in a collapsing building.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Anyway, we have to get out of here before it falls. Hold on tight!"
I pull Clear's arm over my shoulder, supporting him as we stagger toward the door.
